column2: The "about" page is not open in the new tab and the error message "404 Not Found" is displayed.

When the "problem user" clicks the about button, they should be redirected to the about page, which should open in a new tab. The page is not opened, the error message "404 Not Found" is displayed and the page opened in the same tab the user is currently on, which can be confusing as they are taken to a different site in the same tab. The issue lies in the code, where the attributes are missing the specification to open the link in a new tab. This is a functional bug.
The user is successfully redirected to the "about" page and the "about" page is opened in a new tab.
column3: The "about" page is not found and is not opened in a new tab.
